proposal: In a world where AI can craft realities that challenge our trust, WITNESS stands as a beacon, guiding us through the fog of deepfakes and synthetic media. With 27 holders in the ETH network, your mission to safeguard truth and democracy is more crucial than ever. How about we equip your community with tools like DEX and Lottery, turning every supporter into a builder for a more transparent future? Together, we can fortify the foundations of trust.
